bakalib.modules package¶

Submodules¶

bakalib.modules._generic module¶

generic¶

class bakalib.modules._generic.GenericModule(client: bakalib.core.client.Client = None, url: str = None, token: str = None)¶

Bases: bakalib.utils.Base

Generic module class, used by other modules.

Parameters

  • client (Client, optional) – Instance of Client, defaults to None

  • url (str, optional) – URL of the school server, defaults to None

  • token (str, optional) – Token of the client, defaults to None

Raises

  • BakalibError – If Client not logged in

  • BakalibError – If invalid module arguments

bakalib.modules.grades module¶

grades¶

class bakalib.modules.grades.GradesModule(client: bakalib.core.client.Client = None, url: str = None, token: str = None)¶

Bases: bakalib.modules._generic.GenericModule

This is a class for accessing grades of a client

Parameters

  • client (Client, optional) – Instance of Client, defaults to None

  • url (str, optional) – URL of the school server, defaults to None

  • token (str, optional) – Access token of a client, defaults to None

class Subject(name: str, abbr: str, average_round: str, average: str, recalculation: str, points_to_grade: str, quarter: str, note: str, glob_note: str, grades: List[ForwardRef('GradesModule.Grade')])¶

subjects() → List[bakalib.modules.grades.GradesModule.Subject]¶

Fetches all subjects and grades

Raises

BakalibError – If no grades returned

bakalib.modules.timetable module¶

timetable¶

class bakalib.modules.timetable.TimetableModule(client: bakalib.core.client.Client = None, url: str = None, token: str = None, date: datetime.date = datetime.date(2020, 1, 9))¶

Bases: bakalib.modules._generic.GenericModule

This is a class for accessing timetables of a client

Parameters

  • client (Client, optional) – Instance of a client, defaults to None

  • url (str, optional) – URL of the school server, defaults to None

  • token (str, optional) – Access token, defaults to None

  • date (datetime.date, optional) – Initial date, defaults to datetime.date.today()

class Day(abbr: str, date: str, lessons: List[ForwardRef('TimetableModule.Lesson')])¶

Bases: object

Bases: object

clear_cache() → None¶

Clears all entries related to timetable from cache

date_week(date: datetime.date = None, prune: bool = True) → bakalib.modules.timetable.TimetableModule.Result¶

Fetches timetable data

Parameters

  • date (datetime.date, optional) – Date used to fetch the data, defaults to None

  • prune (bool, optional) – Remove unnecessary empty lessons, defaults to True

Returns

Dataclass containing all days

Return type

TimetableModule.Result

class bakalib.modules.TimetableModule(client: bakalib.core.client.Client = None, url: str = None, token: str = None, date: datetime.date = datetime.date(2020, 1, 9))¶

Bases: bakalib.modules._generic.GenericModule

This is a class for accessing timetables of a client

Parameters

  • url (str, optional) – URL of the school server, defaults to None

  • token (str, optional) – Access token, defaults to None

  • date (datetime.date, optional) – Initial date, defaults to datetime.date.today()
